articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Wonsan Shoes Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Wonsan Shoes Factory
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Wonsan Shoes Factory.
					 Shaking hands with the familiar officials of the factory, he appreciated much efforts made by its workers to attain the goal of the 200-day campaign by the end of August last in the vim and vigor with which they greeted the Seventh Congress of the Party after overfulfilling their yearly national economy plan during the 70-day campaign of loyalty. He highly praised them for putting into practice the Party's intention of having turned the factory into a model and icon of the shoes factories of the nation.
					
					 He went round the room dedicated to the history of the factory.
					
					 Satisfied to learn that the factory is effectively conducting the education of its employees in various forms and by diverse methods after successfully arranging the room dedicated to its history so that they may keenly feel leader Kim Jong Il's love for the people, he called on them to bring their products to the world level with the pride and honor of working at the glorious factory and thus implement the instructions given by the leader to it to the letter.
					
					 Going round the injection molding workteam, shoe-making shop, instep strap shop, designing room and other places of the factory, he learnt in detail about the production and quality of products.
					
					 Looking with a broad smile at varieties of shoes for men, women and children manufactured by the factory, he said that he could notice the increase in varieties of shoes and improved style of shoes. "They look very nice and it is gratifying," he said, adding with pleasure that the factory has greeted a heyday for shoes.
					
					 He set forth the tasks facing the Wonsan Shoes Factory.
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that the factory would make uninterrupted innovations and advance in the spirit of Mallima as befitting the factory to which the Party pays deep attention.
					
					 He was accompanied by Jo Yong Won, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Greetings to Popular Liberation Movement of Angola
articles.content:
Greetings to Popular Liberation Movement of Angola
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on Friday sent a message of greeting to the C.C., Popular Liberation Movement of Angola on its 60th founding anniversary.
					 The message said that the Movement won the independence of the country and defended the nation's sovereignty through an arduous armed struggle and has made great achievements in the work to consolidate the country's political stability and national harmony and achieve the socio-economic progress for the past 6 decades.
					
					 It expressed satisfaction over the fact that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties with a long history and good tradition are further developing in the interests of the peoples of the two countries through a joint struggle for independence against imperialism.
					
					 In the belief that the bilateral relations would continue to favorably develop in the future, too, the message sincerely wished that the Movement would successfully attain the high goal set by its 7th Congress and register bigger successes in its work for the country's independent development and prosperity.

articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Denounces Office of UN High Commissioner for Human Rights
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Denounces Office of UN High Commissioner for Human Rights
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK Friday gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA as regards the fact that the Office of the UN High Commissioner for Human Rights pulled up the DPRK over the issue of divided families in the north and the south of Korea:
					 The Office of the UN High Commissioner for Human Rights slandered the DPRK in a "report" on the issue of divided families in the north and the south on Dec. 7, citing all sorts of fabricated information that the north "abducted" someone.
					
					 The DPRK resolutely rejects the above-said "report" peppered with lies and fabrications cooked up by the south Korean authorities published by the Office of the UN High Commissioner for Human Rights despite its repeated warnings, branding this as hostile act against the DPRK. 
					
					 As already the DPRK clarified several times, it has nothing to do with the word of abduction.
					
					 The suspension of the reunion of the divided families and relatives which had been regularly arranged thanks to the positive measures and sincere efforts of the DPRK in the past is entirely attributable to the south Korean authorities' acts of bringing the inter-Korean relations to complete collapse by ceaselessly luring and abducting citizens of the DPRK.
					
					 In April last the south Korean authorities mobilized gangsters of the Intelligence Service to abduct a group of more than 10 women citizens of the DPRK in a foreign country and the chief executive of south Korea openly agitated "defection from the north". This proves that the south Korean authorities are a group of inhumane criminals whose main job is abduction.
					
					 The Office of the UN High Commissioner for Human Rights made public the above-said "report" at the time when the south Korean authorities are hit hard from all sides for the "Park Geun Hye scandal". This is the unreasonable action taken by the Office away from the principle of objectivity and impartiality, which keep the Office alive, following the south Korean authorities keen to seek a way out in escalating the north-south confrontation. 
					
					 If the Office is truly concerned for the solution of the issue of the divided families and relatives, it should bring charges against the chief executive of south Korea resorting to undisguised agitation of "defection from the north" and the gangsters of the Intelligence Service of south Korea that lured and abducted a group of women citizens of the DPRK in broad daylight, to begin with, and demand the south Korean authorities send back those to the DPRK at once.

articles.title: DPRK Party and State Delegation Back Home from Cuba
articles.content:
DPRK Party and State Delegation Back Home from Cuba
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK party and state delegation headed by Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, returned home on Friday after taking part in the mourning ceremonies over the death of Fidel Castro Ruz, supreme leader of the Cuban revolution.

articles.title: Family of Chinese Related to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle Here
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong, a Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, Friday laid bunches of flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill here and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong, a Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, Friday laid bunches of flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill here and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Participants in 8th UAWK Congress Visit Some Places
articles.content:
Participants in 8th UAWK Congress Visit Some Places
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 8th Congress of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) visited the Phyongchon Revolutionary Site.
					 They went round various parts of the site where President Kim Il Sung worked heart and soul for building a regular army after Korea's liberation.
					
					 They also toured Chongsan-ri where the Chongsanri spirit and Chongsanri method were created. They laid a basket of flowers and bouquets before the statue of the President standing there.
					
					 Being briefed on how Chongsanri came to take the lead in all spheres of ideology, technology and culture, they looked round historic relics and data displayed at the Chongsanri Revolutionary Site.
					
					 They also visited the Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Sadong District of Pyongyang, which had turned into an example in the construction of socialist rural culture and a fairy-land in the era of the Workers' Party, and a photo exhibition marking the 8th UAWK Congress and an exhibition of achievements made by the UAWK. And they had a pleasant time at Munsu Water Park.

articles.title: Workshop Given for Participants of UAWK Congress
articles.content:
Workshop Given for Participants of UAWK Congress
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- A workshop was given here on Friday for the participants of the 8th Congress of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK).
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un saw to it that the congress was convened and sent a letter to its participants.
					
					 The letter serves as undying guidelines for strengthening the union and implementing the party's idea of building socialist farm and accomplishing the cause of socialism of Juche, true to the program for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Those who took the floor at the workshop underlined the need for all participants of the congress to deeply grasp the main idea and contents of the letter sent by Kim Jong Un and referred to the practical ways for building the union into a revolutionary and militant organization remaining true to the idea and cause of the Workers' Party of Korea by modeling the whole union on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 They stressed the need for all participants to bear deep in mind the letter of Kim Jong Un and fulfill their duty in the struggle for modeling the whole union on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and carrying out the Party's far-reaching plan for socialist rural construction.

articles.title: Performance by Winners of Art Festival of Agricultural Workers
articles.content:
Performance by Winners of Art Festival of Agricultural Workers
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- A performance titled "We Will Follow Marshal to the End of the Earth" was given at the People's Palace of Culture here on Friday by the winners of the national art festival of agricultural workers celebrating the 8th Congress of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea.
					 Attending the performance were members of art groups from primary organizations of the union in various farms across the country.
					
					 Its numbers included poem "General and Our Migok Field" and female solo and chorus "Our Dear Marshal".
					
					 The performers praised President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for having brought a great turn in the socialist rural construction and showed the agricultural workers' deep reverence and heart-felt gratitude to supreme leader Kim Jong Un for indicating the bright road to be followed by the union.
					
					 They also well represented the joy of peasants leading a happy life in modern villages.
					
					 The performance was enjoyed by the participants in the 8th UAWK Congress.

articles.title: Project for Int'l Green Model Zone Pushed Forward in DPRK
articles.content:
Project for Int'l Green Model Zone Pushed Forward in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has pushed ahead with the project to develop Kangryong County of South Hwanghae Province into an international green model zone.
					 Kangryong County has favorable conditions for the project, as it is bound on sea rich in marine resources like sea cucumber and scallop. And its beachfront is abundant in energy resources, including wind, solar and tidal powers.
					
					 The county has circumstances favorable for sustainable development of agricultural production by means of bettering its ecosystem with organic farming method and introducing ring-shaped rotation production system.
					
					 In this regard, Hong Kil Nam, director of the Secretariat of the Korea Green Research and Development Association, told KCNA:
					
					 The county is highly potential to be a world-level green zone for its excellent natural ecological environment and good conditions for the development of fishery and agriculture.
					
					 With an increasing interest of the government in the county, a master plan for developing the whole county into an international green model zone was well matured in keeping with the reality of the DPRK and the world trend of development.
					
					 The master plan regards it as its principle to protect and improve the county's natural ecological environment, set up a system of ecological circulation featuring the green zone, raise the utilization of resources and energy to the maximum and achieve the sustainable economic development. To this end, the plan includes such detailed projects as construction of an industrial zone for production of green goods, infrastructure and tourist zones with populated, forest and other areas.
					
					 Meanwhile, it is gaining momentum to draw up detailed plans and create a favorable environment for investment.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il and His Padded Clothing
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il and His Padded Clothing
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, supreme leader Kim Jong Un visited the Samjiyon County, Ryanggang Province of the DPRK. Taking a view of leader Kim Jong Il's statue in the county for a good while, he said that the army and people of the country always have in their minds the image of Kim Jong Il wearing a padded clothing and glasses.
					 The padded clothing was the only one for winter season Kim Jong Il had put on from the period of the Arduous March to the last moments of his life to inspect military units and different parts of the country with a sense of obligation to defend the country.
					
					 With the approach of the 5th anniversary of his demise, the Korean people are cherishing the sacred memory of Kim Jong Il who had made a long journey for the prosperity of the country, having on the padded clothing.
					
					 Thanks to the long journey of great devotion he made, the socialism could be firmly defended and a solid foundation laid for building a thriving country.
					
					 In Juche 100 (2011) alone, the last year of his life, over one hundred and scores of news about his revolutionary activities were reported.
					
					 Indeed, his padded clothing is the symbol of Songun revolution conveying the boundless love for the country and people of the peerlessly great man.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Carrying WPK's Plan on Socialist Rural Construction into Practice
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Carrying WPK's Plan on Socialist Rural Construction into Practice
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a letter to those attending the 8th Congress of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea to provide a great program to be held fast to by the union in accomplishing the cause of building a socialist power under the banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					 The letter serves as an important guideline for glorifying the idea on rural construction of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their leadership feats, Rodong Sinmun Friday in an editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 In their lifetime the great leaders had walked ridge-ways between paddy-fields together with agricultural workers, laying an eternal foundation for solving the peasant issue, the agricultural issue.
					
					 Only when the militant tasks set forth by Kim Jong Un in the letter are thoroughly carried out, can it be possible for the agricultural workers to fulfill their duty as patriotic peasants intensely loyal to the great leaders and give a steady continuity to the history of rich harvest provided by them.
					
					 The role of the UAWK should be enhanced to prepare the peasants as genuine masters of the socialist countryside and bring about a great victory on the agricultural front as intended by the Party. Then, it will be possible to consolidate our revolutionary position as firm as rock and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist power.
					
					 The editorial calls on all the union members and other agricultural workers to step up the socialist rural construction under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, cherishing the pledge they made before the Party, the country and the people with the 8th Congress of the union as an occasion.

articles.title: Traitor Park's Sleight of Hand Can Never Work: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Traitor Park's Sleight of Hand Can Never Work: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea made her third "talk to the people" peppered with excuses aimed at evasion of responsibilities, far from resigning her post as "president", a crafty farce to prolong her remaining days, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 Branding this as a sly trick to calm down the public wrath, get the ruling and opposition camps to pit against each other, earn sympathy from the conservative forces, disturb the movement for her impeachment and thus stay in power to the last, the article goes on:
					
					 Park said that she would leave everything to the decision of the "National Assembly", a deceptive trick to evade the worst ruling crisis and serve out her term.
					
					 The publication of the "talk to the people" is, in essence, a farce for disturbing the situation over the impeachment and dragging the time away. This was proven by her rhetoric about "NA's decision" and "proposal for handover of 'state administration'". Lurking behind this is a black-hearted intention to escalate the fighting between the ruling and opposition forces in the "NA" and disturb the situation over the impeachment on the one hand and get time enough to rally the conservative forces and find a way-out on the other hand.
					
					 The aim sought by the traitor is to pass the ball over to the "NA", escalate political strife and resort to hold-out-to-the last strategy under the pretext of indecision between the ruling and opposition forces.
					
					 No sleight of hand can work and nothing can quench the public mindset set to punish Park Geun Hye.
					
					 No matter how desperately Park may try not to leave Chongwadae, it is useless. Her trick will only bring earlier the moment when she will face stern punishment by the south Korean public.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Derides Japan's Moral Vulgarity
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Derides Japan's Moral Vulgarity
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- An honorary professor at Tokyo University of Japan, shortly ago, urged the present chief executive of the country to make due apology and reparation to victimized nations over the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 Earlier, victims of the sexual slavery residing in different parts of the world held a rally in Tokyo under the sponsorship of a Japanese civic organization to denounce the despicable acts of the Japanese authorities.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Friday says this is an expression of the Japanese people's disillusion about the imperialist history interwoven with cursed crimes as well as their desire to live before the world with clean conscience after redressing all past crimes.
					
					 But the Japanese authorities are making desperate efforts to keep the issue of sexual slavery under the carpet of history, not lending an ear to the demand of its own people, to say nothing of the world denunciation, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Japan should face up to the reality.
					
					 Its zealous efforts to realize its ambition for reinvasion, being unaware of how the world goes around, remind one of a new-born puppy knowing no fear of a tiger.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should not forget even a moment that the destiny of the Japanese archipelago is within the powerful nuclear striking range of the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese authorities can be honest before their own people and before justice and conscience only when they sincerely repent of their past crimes and make due apology and reparation for them. Only then can they earn the international community's confidence and live in peace.

articles.title: S. Korean NA Slammed for Passing Draft Military Budget
articles.content:
S. Korean NA Slammed for Passing Draft Military Budget
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea on Dec. 5 issued a commentary protesting the "National Assembly's" unreasonable act of passing the draft military budget for next year with main emphasis on the introduction of weapons for aggression, according to a media report.
					 The military budget increased four percent over this year's, the commentary noted, terming it an act that shunned society exposed to difficulties.
					
					 It criticized that the NA followed the policy of putting the Korean peninsula at peril through the introduction of all types of weapons for executing the strategy for a preemptive attack on the north.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Derides Park Geun Hye's Silliness
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Derides Park Geun Hye's Silliness
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on Wednesday issued an editorial denouncing Park Geun Hye for trying to hold out to the last even after impeachment.
					 Noting that Park called "Saenuri Party" coteries to Chongwadae on Dec. 6 and uttered she would do her best even after she is impeached, the editorial said her remarks prove that she does not admit her wrongs even a bit.
					
					 This also tells that her third "talk to the people" in which she said she would follow the decision of the "National Assembly" was just a lie, it said, adding that her brazen-faced attitude and desperate efforts to stay in "presidency" are leading not only herself but the society to unspeakable misfortune.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Reveals Choe Sun Sil's High-handed Practices
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Reveals Choe Sun Sil's High-handed Practices
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean KBS on Thursday disclosed that Choe Sun Sil had always behaved in a high-handed manner backed by Park Geun Hye.
					 Quoting a statement of Cha Un Thaek, a confidant of Park, it said that the results of investigation into the Choe Sun Sil scandal produced lots of testimonies helping size up the situation and atmosphere in which Choe monopolized "state administration." 
					
					 According to Cha, Choe always regarded herself to be at the same level as Park and sometimes she handled the "president". Cha confessed that he asked Choe to let Park take part in three events organized by him and that Choe always rode roughshod over other people with the backing of the "president".

articles.title: Disbandment of Ruling Party Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Disbandment of Ruling Party Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions staged actions across south Korea all at once demanding the immediate resignation of Park Geun Hye and the disbandment of the "Saenuri Party" on Dec. 7, according to reports.
					 The Kangwon headquarters of the confederation held press conferences all at once in six places in south Korean Kangwon Province including Wonju, Kangrung and Chunchon.
					
					 The organization denounced the "Saenuri Party" for mocking at the people with such rhetoric as "resignation in April" after Park's third "talk to the people".
					
					 The Jeju headquarters of the confederation also held a press conference demanding the disbandment of the "Saenuri Party."

articles.title: S. Korean Young People Stage Surprise Demo in Demand of Park Geun Hye's Resignation
articles.content:
S. Korean Young People Stage Surprise Demo in Demand of Park Geun Hye's Resignation
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Voice of People said that south Korean young people waged a surprise demo on the road near Chongwadae on Dec. 8 in demand of Park Geun Hye's resignation.
					 The demonstrators chanted a slogan "Arrest Park Geun Hye, criminal, at once", with placards reading "Arrest Park Geun Hye" in their hands.

articles.title: S. Korea: Opposition Camps Blast Ruling Party for Insulting Candlelight Ralliers
articles.content:
S. Korea: Opposition Camps Blast Ruling Party for Insulting Candlelight Ralliers
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The gentries of the ruling "Saenuri Party" in south Korea dined and wined all night while the 6th All-People Action was under way, and thus angered the public, according to the south Korean online paper OhmyNews.
					 In this regard, the Taegu City Committee of the opposition Minju Party made public a statement denouncing the brazen-faced deed of the gentries on Dec. 6.
					
					 The Jongui Party, too, released a statement condemning the ruling party as a terrorist one.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper on What Traitor Park Did at Time of Ferry Sinking
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper on What Traitor Park Did at Time of Ferry Sinking
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- It was reported in south Korea that traitor Park Geun Hye spent time to dress her hair, instead of taking steps for rescue, at an early hour of the ferry Sewol sinking.
					 At the time when Sewol was sinking, Park summoned the chief of a beauty parlor in Kangnam District of Seoul to Chongwadae, according to the south Korean newspaper Hangyore.
					
					 At the instruction of Chongwadae the hairdresser had no other way but to cancel those appointments and spend about 90 minutes dressing Park's hair at her official residence.
					
					 A person concerned who was familiar with the situation at that time testified to the fact that "dressing Park's hair took about 90 minutes as usual".
					
					 A video saying that Park had orthopedic treatment at that time was recently posted on social network, sparking off uproar among broad segment of people.

articles.title: Bird Flu Spreads in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Spreads in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- Bird flu spreads in south Korea, increasing damage, according to the south Korean KBS and CBS on Dec. 6.
					 Fowls on a breed duck farm and a chicken farm in South Chungchong Province were reported to have been infected by bird flu virus that day.
					
					 Earlier, a whooper swan found dead in South Kyongsang Province was also confirmed to have been infected by the same virus.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Congo
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- A Congolese committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Brazzaville on Dec. 5.
					 Vital Balla, chairman of the Congolese Association for Friendship among Peoples, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to widely introduce the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il through media and organize political and cultural functions such as a remembrance meeting and film show on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Algerian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Algerian
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- An Algerian writer dedicated an article to the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The article said that the successes made by the DPRK are a brilliant fruition of leader Kim Jong Il's indefatigable efforts.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The Algerian people pay high tribute to HE Kim Jong Il on the occasion of Dec. 17, the day when the Korean people look back upon the career of the great man in reverence every year.
					
					 We deeply respect him who dedicated his whole life to the people.
					
					 Kim Jong Il had led the country and people to victory and prosperity, true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung, the founder of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 He is, indeed, the greatest man as he made a long journey of field guidance for the country and people without rest despite his pent-up fatigue.
					
					 The course of field guidance in which he visited more than 14,000 units across the country in his lifetime is equivalent to 17 times the circumference of the earth.
					
					 I pay the highest tribute to HE Kim Jong Il being revered by all people with my will to follow him forever.

articles.title: DPRK Leaders' Works Disseminated in Various Countries
articles.content:
DPRK Leaders' Works Disseminated in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- Seminars and reading sessions on works of the great leader Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un were held in Romania, Switzerland, Mexico and Nigeria from Nov. 23 to Dec. 3.
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, said at a seminar on Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science" that the work is a precious textbook to be regarded by the progressive mankind aspiring after socialism as the guidelines.
					
					 Martin Lotscher, chief of the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, said at a seminar on Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il founded the Songun idea and developed it in depth and thus provided the guidelines and banner of victory to be held fast to by mankind in accomplishing the cause of independence.
					
					 Ramon Jimenez Lopez, chairman of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, at a reading session on Kim Jong Un's work praised the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il for the country and people.
					
					 Igwanagu Nicholas, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, briefed on the main content of "Let Us Further Intensify the Work of the Women's Union under the Banner of Modelling the Whole Society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism", a letter of Kim Jong Un to those attending the Sixth Congress of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, and said that his letter serves as an important guidelines for strengthening the union and enhancing its militant function and role.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, December 9 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on a website on Dec. 5 the detailed gist of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party".
					 The work published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 And it indicates the tasks for steadily strengthening the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige en el terreno la Fabrica de Zapatos de Wonsan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige en el terreno la Fabrica de Zapatos de Wonsan
Pyongyang, 9 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Zapatos de Wonsan que normaliza la produccion.
					Estrechando la mano con los funcionarios de la planta ya conocidos, el Mariscal dijo que los obreros de aqui trabajaron mucho para cumplir hasta finales de agosto la meta de la campana de 200 dias con el mismo espiritu e impetu con que han acogido el VII Congreso del PTC tras sobrecumplir el plan anual de economia nacional durante la campana de 70 dias de fidelidad. Y les aprecio mucho diciendo que ellos cumplen con accion el proposito del partido que convirtio la planta en la zapateria ejemplar y estandarizada.
					
					Seguidamente, recorrio la sala de presentacion del historial. 
					
					Se mostro complacido de que la fabrica haya acondicionado bien esa sala y realizara de diversas maneras la educacion, de modo que los empleados pudieran sentir en carne propia el amor por el pueblo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Asevero que con el orgullo de laborar en este centro de trabajo glorioso, ellos deben materializar cabalmente los legados del Dirigente al situar en el nivel mundial la calidad de sus productos. 
					
					Pasando revista a varios puntos de la fabrica inclusive la brigada de trabajo de inyeccion, el taller de zapateria, el de pala y la sala de diseno, se cercioro del estado de produccion y la calidad de productos. 
					
					Examinando sonriente los zapatos de diferentes formas para el hombre, la mujer y la infancia, hechos en la fabrica, expreso que se incrementaron sus variedades y se hicieron mas refinadas sus apariencias y agrego que le complace mucho ver los montones de zapatos. 
					
					A continuacion, presento las tareas que incumben a la fabrica. 
					
					Expuso la esperanza y conviccion de que la fabrica seguira registrando innovaciones y marchando adelante como jinete de Mallima sin olvidar que el partido le presta profunda atencion.
					
					Le acompano en esta visita el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente electo de Gambia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente electo de Gambia
Pyongyang, 9 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, remitio el dia 7 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente electo de Gambia, Adama Barrow.
					En su misiva, el remitente expuso la seguridad de que se intensificaran y se desarrollaran aun mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre ambos paises y deseo exitos en las responsabilidades del destinatario para el desarrollo del pais y el bienestar del pueblo.

articles.title: Vocero de cancilleria coreana denuncia a la Oficina de Alto Comisionado de la ONU para DDHH
articles.content:
Vocero de cancilleria coreana denuncia a la Oficina de Alto Comisionado de la ONU para DDHH
Pyongyang, 9 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En exclusiva con la ACNC concedida el dia 9 con motivo de que la Oficina de Alto Comisionado de la ONU para los Derechos Humanos acuso a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el tema de familiares separados en ambas partes coreanas, el vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio la siguiente respuesta:
					El dia 7, la Oficina de Alto Comisionado de la ONU para los Derechos Humanos orquesto la farsa de publicacion del "informe" sobre el problema de familiares separados en el Norte y el Sur de Corea y acuso a la RPDC enumerando los datos falsificados de todo tipo como "secuestro" a alguien. 
					
					Rechazamos rotundamente ese "informe" calificando como acto hostil anti-RPDC la publicacion forzada del mismo por parte de la Oficina a pesar de nuestra reiterada advertencia y a base de fraudes y embustes inventados por las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					Como hemos reiterado en varias ocasiones, no tenemos nada que ver con la palabra "secuestro". 
					
					La suspension del encuentro de familiares y parientes separados, que se realizaba normalmente gracias a nuestras medidas protagonicas y esfuerzos sinceros, se debe al Sur de Corea que llevo a la ruptura total las relaciones intercoreanas cometiendo sin parar el rapto y secuestro a nuestros ciudadanos. 
					
					En abril pasado, las autoridades surcoreanas raptaron en colectivo a mas de 10 ciudadanas norcoreanas, que trabajaban en el extranjero, movilizando a los gangsteres del Servicio de Inteligencia y la misma mandataria surcoreana agito abiertamente la "fuga del Norte", lo cual demuestra que ellas son la banda de delincuentes antieticos que se dedican al secuestro.
					
					La Oficina ha publicado el "informe" coincidiendo con que las autoridades surcoreanas se encuentran en el callejon sin salida como consecuencia del "escandalo de Park Geun-hye". Este hecho deviene un proceder injusto que viola la imparcialidad y objetividad, principios vitales del aparato, para favorecer a las autoridades surcoreanas que tratan de buscar la salida en la confrontacion intercoreana. 
					
					Si esta interesada de veras en la solucion del problema de familiares y parientes separados, la Oficina debe incriminar primero a la mandataria surcoreana, que suele agitar abiertamente la "fuga del Norte", y a los gangsteres del Servicio de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea que raptaron a plena luz del dia a las ciudadanas norcoreanas.
					
					Ademas, tiene que exigir a las autoridades surcoreanas la devolucion inmediata de esas victimas de secuestro.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela intriga fraudulenta de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela intriga fraudulenta de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 9 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un articulo individual divulgado el dia 9, revela que en vez de retirarse, la traidora Park Geun-hye publico la tercera "declaracion al pueblo", llena de excusas y evasion de responsabilidad, lo que sirve de la farsa astuta para mantener a toda costa su sucia vida restante.
					No cabe duda de que esta conducta de Park deviene la astucia para calmar la colera de la poblacion y el fraude para mantener el poder perturbando el proceso de retirada, al sembrar discordias entre los partidos gobernante y opositores y acaparar la simpatia de la fuerza conservadora, asi senala el articulo y continua:
					
					La traidora Park Geun-hye disparateo que encargara todos los problemas a la decision de la "Asamblea Nacional", lo cual no pasa de ser una intriga para evitar la extremada crisis de gobierno y cumplir su mandato hasta el final.
					
					Es decir, la publicacion de la tercera "declaracion al pueblo" es la operacion para perturbar la situacion politica por la retirada de Park y la tactica dilatoria. Los disparates respecto a la decision de la "Asamblea Nacional" y el "proyecto de traspaso del 'poder'" persiguen el proposito infame para agravar el conflicto entre los partidos gobernante y opositores, desordenar el corriente de retirada y ganar el tiempo para reagrupar la fuerza conservadora y buscar la salida de la crisis.
					
					Park intenta agravar la pugna politica imputando la responsabilidad a la "Asamblea Nacional" y resistir infinitamente negando la retirada bajo el pretexto de que los partidos gobernante y opositores no lograron el acuerdo.
					
					Pero, la tactica de ella para escaparse de la crisis nunca puede calmar el impetu de la poblacion para juzgar a la traidora.
					
					Por mas que Park Geun-hye se desespere para no salir de Chongwadae, se acercara mas rapidamente el momento de ser castigada severamente por la poblacion surcoreana.
